articles.content: Nitesh Tiwari was in the middle of an ad commercials shoot when his wife, filmmaker Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari came running and started screaming in joy. National Film Awards had just been announced on Mond… [+1859 chars]

articles.title: On Smriti Irani's Birthday, Friend Ekta Kapoor Requests To Go Off Diet - NDTV Food
articles.description: Wishes poured in for Smriti Irani's birthday on 23rd March, including a sweet one from her close friend - television producer Ekta Kapoor.
